note.p: Death: Ventnor, Isle of Wight, Hampshire (08 June 1882)

Career: Manager of a large ship building firm, Greenock; moved to London (1844); promoter of the Great Exhibition (1851); worked in ship building on the Thames; involved with Isambard Kingdom Brunel (FRS 1830) in building the steamship "Great Eastern" (1854-1857)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1882-1883 vol 34 pp xv-xvii signed by P S
